trans-unit.source: Even the most conservative generals revised their tactics after the Battle of Sarinth, during which a handful of peasant-pikemen held off a trio of rampaging craw wurms.
trans-unit.target: Even the most conservative generals revised their tactics after the Battle of Sarinth, during which a handful of peasant-pikemen held off a trio of rampaging craw wurms.

trans-unit.source: Winter Orb
trans-unit.target: Winter Orb

trans-unit.source: Players cannot untap more than one land during their untap phases.
trans-unit.target: Players cannot untap more than one land during their untap phases.

trans-unit.source:
"When once winter has ahold,
Not willingly does she withdraw
Her icy touch, wistfully caressing—
The deepened air sleeps its cold."
—Aline Corralurn, "Late Thaw"

"When once winter has ahold,
